sentences.sContent: Adopting jatropha, he thinks, will be a first step out of poverty for Malawi's farmers, and they seem willing to try.
sentences.sCn: 他认为，种植麻疯树将是马拉维农民摆脱贫困的第一步，而这些农民似乎也愿意尝试一下。

sentences.sContent: "Anyone could come to Malawi and quickly arrange for an adoption that might have grave consequences on the very children that the law seeks to protect," she said.
sentences.sCn: 她说：“任何人都可以到马拉维很快办理收养事宜，这可能会对那些法律寻求保护的孩子产生严重后果。”

sentences.sContent: The main section of the valley in Africa continues from the Red Sea across Ethiopia and across Kenya, Tanzania, and Malawi to the lower Zambezi River valley in Mozambique.
sentences.sCn: 大峡谷的主体部分来自非洲，延伸自红海穿过埃塞俄比亚，横跨两岸的肯尼亚、坦桑尼亚、马拉维到莫桑比克的赞比西河流域下游.
